Choke

Jewel Cases

  1. No cracks, however scratches may be present.
  2. Completely intact, no weak/broken hinges.
  3. Original insert and back cover always present.

CDs

  1. Little to no scratching.
  2. Original disc.
  3. Skipping is not present in any of our items.

Record Jackets

  1. May show small signs of usage.
  2. Intact and free of major tears.
  3. May not come with record sleeve.

LPs

  1. Minimal crackling.
  2. No loops.
  3. Free of skips.
